title: What's news in v2.40.0
content:
Features:
  - Clipboard support for layers, frames, and cells
  - Option to save palette loaded from Lospec automatically

Enhancements:
  - Original coordinate paste will place the content in the center of the screen if the original coordinate is outside of the canvas
  - Minor performance improvements
  - Minor UI enhancements

Fixes:
  - Tile brush freezes the app when applied outside of the canvas
  - Unstable precise move button
